monsterDetails.exploreAbilityDescription: - Burns vines - Enkindles torches - Activates fire orbs
monsterDetails.lightShiftAbilityDescription: Aura: Whenever an allied Monster applies a Debuff, it gains 2 Charge stacks.

skills.name: Attack Plus
skills.description: Improve Attack rating by 1 (Increases Attack by 26)

skills.name: Auto Heal
skills.description: When attacking, also heal the Monster with the lowest health in the party by 200% of Magic.

skills.name: Cleansing Flame
skills.description: 5 x 40% (200%) magical damage (fire) Removes 1 Buff from target

skills.name: Cleansing Flame Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 55% (275%) magical damage (fire) Removes 2 Buffs from target

skills.name: Cleansing Flame Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 70% (350%) magical damage (fire) Removes 2 Buffs from target

skills.name: Cleansing Flame Lvl 4
skills.description: 5 x 90% (450%) magical damage (fire) Removes 3 Buffs from target

skills.name: Crit Chance Plus
skills.description: +5% Critical Chance

skills.name: Crit Damage Plus
skills.description: +15% Critical Damage

skills.name: Critical Consistency
skills.description: +10% Critical Damage. Critical Damage also increases non-Critical hits by 10% of the amount.

skills.name: Critical Defense
skills.description: Reduces damage taken by 10% of own Critical Damage value.

skills.name: Critical Heat
skills.description: The first critical hit of an ability applies Burn (Debuff).

skills.name: Dark Instinct
skills.description: Increases damage dealt by 20%.

skills.name: Defense Plus
skills.description: Improve Defense rating by 1 (Increases Defense by 37)

skills.name: Dominance
skills.description: Aura: Enemies receive 3% increased damage for each Debuff on them.

skills.name: Empower
skills.description: Aura: All Monsters in the party deal 5% more damage.

skills.name: Encapsulate
skills.description: Heal target for 5 x (40 + 15% Magic) Shield target for 1 x (80% Max Mana)

skills.name: Encapsulate Lvl 2
skills.description: Heal target for 6 x (50 + 20% Magic) Shield target for 1 x (100% Max Mana)

skills.name: Encapsulate Lvl 3
skills.description: Heal target for 7 x (60 + 20% Magic) Shield target for 1 x (120% Max Mana)

skills.name: Encapsulate Lvl 4
skills.description: Heal target for 8 x (70 + 20% Magic) Shield target for 1 x (150% Max Mana)

skills.name: Encapsulate Lvl 5
skills.description: Heal target for 9 x (90 + 20% Magic) Shield target for 1 x (200% Max Mana)

skills.name: Fire Breath
skills.description: 2 x 150% (300%) magical damage (fire) Hits all enemies Removes 1 Buff from targets - Applies a random Buff to whole party

skills.name: Fire Resistance
skills.description: Fire damage reduced by 50%

skills.name: Flamestrike
skills.description: 1 x 130% magical damage (fire) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Flamestrike Lvl 2
skills.description: 1 x 170% magical damage (fire) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Flamestrike Lvl 3
skills.description: 1 x 225% magical damage (fire) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Flamestrike Lvl 4
skills.description: 1 x 290% magical damage (fire) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Healing Shield
skills.description: Healing skills (active and passive) also apply a Shield equal to 20% of the amount healed.

skills.name: Health Plus
skills.description: Improve Health rating by 1 (Increases Health by 332)

skills.name: Hot to the Touch
skills.description: When this Monster gets attacked, 50% chance to apply Burn on the attacker.

skills.name: Hybrid Shield
skills.description: At the start of combat, apply a Shield equal to 100% of Attack and Magic value.

skills.name: Ignite
skills.description: 3 x 55% (165%) magical damage (fire) Applies Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Ignite Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 50% (200%) magical damage (fire) Applies Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Ignite Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 50% (250%) magical damage (fire) Applies Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Ignite Lvl 4
skills.description: 5 x 65% (325%) magical damage (fire) Applies Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Ignite Lvl 5
skills.description: 6 x 70% (420%) magical damage (fire) Applies Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Inferno
skills.description: 3 x 100% (300%) magical damage (fire) Hits all enemies, every hit has a 20% chance to apply Burn (Debuff).

skills.name: Initial Burn
skills.description: Apply Burn (Debuff) to a random enemy at the start of combat.

skills.name: Kindle
skills.description: Every hit has a 10% chance to apply Burn.

skills.name: Lava Rush
skills.description: 5 x 75% (375%) physical damage (fire) ignores 50% of the target's Defense damage reduction value if it has Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Lava Rush Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 95% (475%) physical damage (fire) ignores 50% of the target's Defense damage reduction value if it has Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Lava Stream
skills.description: 7 x 75% (525%) physical damage (fire) cannot be dodged every hit has a 15% chance to apply Armor Break (Debuff).

skills.name: Lava Wave
skills.description: 2 x 55% (110%) physical damage (fire) Hits all enemies, every hit has a 20% chance to apply Armor Break (Debuff).

skills.name: Lava Wave Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 75% (150%) physical damage (fire) Hits all enemies, every hit has a 20% chance to apply Armor Break (Debuff).

skills.name: Lava Wave Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 100% (200%) physical damage (fire) Hits all enemies, every hit has a 20% chance to apply Armor Break (Debuff).

skills.name: Lava Wave Lvl 4
skills.description: 2 x 130% (260%) physical damage (fire) Hits all enemies, every hit has a 20% chance to apply Armor Break (Debuff).

skills.name: Magic Plus
skills.description: Improve Magic rating by 1 (Increases Magic by 26)

skills.name: Mana Focus
skills.description: Mana and Mana Regeneration values from equipment increased by 25%.

skills.name: Mana Funnel
skills.description: Before an action, there is 10% chance for every 100 Max Mana to gain Might and Sorcery. This monster can receive one additional stack of Might and Sorcery.

skills.name: Mana Overload
skills.description: Increase Attack and Magic by 15% of this Monster's Max Mana.

skills.name: Mana Plus
skills.description: Improve Mana rating by 1 (Increases Mana by 20. Increases Mana Regeneration by 10)

skills.name: Mana Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 50% of Max Mana.

skills.name: Mana Stability
skills.description: Increase Defense by 15% of this Monster's Max Mana.

skills.name: Multi Burn
skills.description: Aura: Burn (Debuff) can be stacked two additional times on enemies. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Overcast
skills.description: Increases the Mana Cost of all attacks, healing and shielding actions by 10% and the power by 15%.

skills.name: Precision
skills.description: First hit of an ability has a 20% increased Critical Chance.

skills.name: Severe Upkeep
skills.description: Unique Aura: Whenever an enemy takes Poison or Burn (Debuff) damage, 50% chance to inflict a Wound stack on them.

skills.name: Spectral Cannon
skills.description: 1 x 375% magical damage (neutral) ignores 50% of the target's Defense damage reduction value

skills.name: Spectral Cannon Lvl 2
skills.description: 1 x 450% magical damage (neutral) ignores 50% of the target's Defense damage reduction value

skills.name: Supremacy
skills.description: Aura: Whenever an allied Monster applies a Debuff, it gains 2 Charge stacks.

skills.name: Tackle
skills.description: 3 x 60% (180%) physical damage (neutral) ignores 25% of the target's Defense damage reduction value

skills.name: Tackle Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 60% (240%) physical damage (neutral) ignores 25% of the target's Defense damage reduction value

skills.name: Tackle Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 60% (300%) physical damage (neutral) ignores 25% of the target's Defense damage reduction value

skills.name: Tackle Lvl 4
skills.description: 6 x 60% (360%) physical damage (neutral) ignores 25% of the target's Defense damage reduction value

skills.name: Tackle Lvl 5
skills.description: 7 x 65% (455%) physical damage (neutral) ignores 25% of the target's Defense damage reduction value

skills.name: Transfusion
skills.description: Recover Health equal to 200% the amount of Mana regenerated.

skills.name: Water Weakness
skills.description: Water damage increased by 50%

skills.name: Wildfire
skills.description: Unique Aura: When a Monster in the party applies Burn on an enemy, 40% chance to spread it to another enemy.

drops.name: Monster Bell
drops.description: Respawns all defeated wild Monsters immediately
